nodes.text: Talia was a female Dathomirian who was a member of the Nightsisters, and an assistant of Talzin. When Asajj Ventress returned to her homeworld of Dathomir, Talia was one of the Nightsisters who confronted her and prepared to execute her until Mother Talzin intervened. Talia eventually helped to administer their returned sister the Water of Life as well as an invisibility potion for Ventress and the Nightsister Hunters Naa'leth and Karis to use to infiltrate Count Dooku's palace on Serenno.
